body:
Hello Mostapha and Chris, Two questions regarding EP components: 1) I n the attached file I am trying to calculate energy values for  custom made zone, of a stand alone volume, but not all of Energy Use outputs are generated. Only Electric Light and Electric Equipment.
The runEnergySimulation report says **"The following Report Variables were requested  but not generated because IDF did not contain these elements or misspelled variable name -- check .rdd file"**. 2) When using a local Weather File and not the URL file location the EP runEnergySimulation is not working. Thanks! Dimitris
topic: Custom Made Zone problems: Zone Energy Use Variables not generated / Local Weather File not Working

replies.body:
For point 1 you need to set the _isConditioned to True in the HB_createHBZones component.

For point 2, you have a space in the path (Dropbox (RAFT ...). You need to choose a path without blank spaces (though i think that in the updated version it is solved).

-A.
